data.text: Uleche kitunya kwa chiwalo cha wehile,
Kwa vila hewo wokwajilila himahima kota misolo,
Witumbile kwa Mkulu Nguluwi na kudita ganojile,
Upale usangalalo wa hegwe kwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Umhe Mkulu Nguluwi ukomu wa hegwe,
naye kokudita kunoga kwa hegwe kupuliche kota lumuli,
Usindamale hali Mkulu Nguluwi, umbeteze kwa kwimilila,
Wiyuse na ng'halazi na uleche kuzudila,
Wanhu walingudita wihe wodumigwa,
Ung'hali mhela uchefu, wehile wokwajilila,
Ila wawele liholile woihalila isi,
Wehile wangiwikaga goya kudita gehile kwa yatanganiche,
Ila Mkulu Nguluwi kanguwasekaga wehile,
Wehile wangusomolaga mipanga ja hewo na kukwega mipinde jawo,
Ila mipanga jawo jokwinjila kwa hewo wawo,
Fola lufufu ludo lwa munhu yatanganiche,
Kwa vila mong'ho wa wehile wobenangwa,
Mkulu Nguluwi kangulolelaga ukomu wa wanhu walihela nongwa,
Hawobasigwa soni hojifika mihela jihile,
Ila wehile wodumigwa,
Wehile wangwazika ne kuhilusa,
Walingutambichizwa na Mkulu Nguluwi woihalila isi,
Mkulu Nguluwi kangulongozaga magulu ga munhu,
Hoyochikwang'wala, hogwa na kupona hasi,
Nandali msongolo na sambi nda sekulu,
Mazuwa gose kanguwapaga wanji kwa kusangalala na kuwazika,
Wiyuse kuli wihe, udite ganojile,
Kwa vila Mkulu Nguluwi kanguwagana wawele na hachi,
Watanganiche woihalila isi,
Munhu yatanganiche kangulongaga ulonzi wa luhala,
Kangibatililaga malajizo ga Nguluwi wa heye mnhumbula mwa heye,
Wehile wangumpugajizaga munhu yanojile na kujeza kumkopola,
ila Mkulu Nguluwi homuwika hebu munhu yanojile kuli ndole za wehile,
Witumbile kwa Mkulu Nguluwi na kibata nzila za heye,
Ndiwona wehile wang'ang'ale,
Hamba nang'hola aho, nawo hawawele hala kahi,
Umjese munhu yalihela nongwa, munhu yatanganiche,
Wawele na nongwa weng'ha wodumigwa,
Mkulu Nguluwi kanguwaloholaga watanganiche,
Mkulu Nguluwi kanguwatanza na kuwalohola,
